top_features.name: Backlogs
top_features.impact: Negative - Higher backlogs reduce placement chances

top_features.name: Skills
top_features.impact: Positive - More skills increase placement probability

student_clusters.name: High Performers
student_clusters.characteristics: High CGPA (>8.0), Multiple skills (8+), Internship experience, Low backlogs
student_clusters.recommendations: Focus on advanced skills, leadership roles, competitive programming

student_clusters.name: Moderate Performers
student_clusters.characteristics: Average CGPA (7.0-8.0), Some projects, Mixed internship status
student_clusters.recommendations: Improve technical skills, gain internship experience, work on communication

student_clusters.name: At-Risk Students
student_clusters.characteristics: Low CGPA (<7.0), Few skills, No internship, High backlogs
student_clusters.recommendations: Clear backlogs, basic skill development, career counseling, intensive support

student_clusters.name: Skill Specialists
student_clusters.characteristics: Moderate CGPA, High technical skills, Project experience
student_clusters.recommendations: Leverage technical expertise, improve academics, portfolio development

key_insights: Students with CGPA > 7.5 show 65% higher placement rates
6+ technical skills provide 2.5x better placement chances
Backlogs have the strongest negative correlation with placement
Workshops and certifications correlate with 45% improvement

for_students: Maintain CGPA above 7.5 for optimal placement chances
Develop 6+ technical skills through courses and practice
Complete at least one internship before final year
Minimize backlogs and clear them as soon as possible
Participate in workshops and obtain relevant certifications
Improve communication skills through practice and training
for_institutions: Identify at-risk students early using predictive models
Facilitate internship opportunities and industry connections
Create support systems for students with academic difficulties
Use data-driven approaches for placement optimization
